articles.description: This in-depth guide covers Apple Watch Series 8 vs 7 and earlier to help you decide what's the best fit for you.
articles.content: The 2022 Apple Watch lineup is here with three new wearables. While much remains the same between Series 8 and previous models, there are some differences worth considering. Read on for Apple Watch S… [+7442 chars]
